recipes.name: Katsudon
recipes.description: Katsudon is a popular Japanese food, a bowl of rice topped with a deep-fried breaded pork cutlet, egg, vegetables, and condiments.

recipes.name: Mac n Cheese
recipes.description: Macaroni and cheese is a dish of macaroni and a cheese sauce, most commonly cheddar sauce.

recipes.name: Fried Rice
recipes.description: Day old white rice seasoned with soy sauce. Mix veg and egg added for taste
